ISSUE.TITLE: Admin rights to install in openshift
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE Suggestion ##### SUMMARY One of our customers suggest to avoid high privileges escalation in order to install Tower over Openshift. He desisted to install Tower for this reason.
